lom:description.lom:string: An introduction to the use of computers and MATLAB programming for the solution of mechanical engineering problems. Topics include: sources of errors in computing, the use of modular software design, basic numerical methods, and signal processing. Keywords: computation, programming, computing, mechanical engineering, civil engineering

lom:title.lom:string: Computing Techniques - Lower Division Course at Georgia Tech
